data.name: Amigo VR
data.detailed_description:
Update 2017/05/12
Fix some bugs.

Update 2017/05/05
The newly installed chip animation system can show 'victory' or 'defeat' directly.
The game performance has been significantly optimized, especially the performance of AMD graphics cards.
There are now introduction of game features, including explanations of how to bet, fold and the function of different regions.
A series of bugs also have been fixed.


Many have played Texas, but have you ever experienced Texas in virtual reality?

Would you like to immerse yourself in the most luxurious casinos in Las Vagas.

Would you like to play Texas with players from all over the world?

Would you like to have real-time conversations with other players?

Would you like to triumph the Texas poker board?

Amigo VR have announced--"Texas Hold'em Poker", the world's most popular poker game.

In Amigo VR, you could sit in your cozy sofa at home, and enjoy an almost real, tense and exciting game of Texas.
data.about_the_game:
Update 2017/05/12
Fix some bugs.

Update 2017/05/05
The newly installed chip animation system can show 'victory' or 'defeat' directly.
The game performance has been significantly optimized, especially the performance of AMD graphics cards.
There are now introduction of game features, including explanations of how to bet, fold and the function of different regions.
A series of bugs also have been fixed.


Many have played Texas, but have you ever experienced Texas in virtual reality?

Would you like to immerse yourself in the most luxurious casinos in Las Vagas.

Would you like to play Texas with players from all over the world?

Would you like to have real-time conversations with other players?

Would you like to triumph the Texas poker board?

Amigo VR have announced--"Texas Hold'em Poker", the world's most popular poker game.

In Amigo VR, you could sit in your cozy sofa at home, and enjoy an almost real, tense and exciting game of Texas.
data.short_description:
With Amigo VR, sitting in the comfortable chairs or sofas in your home, you will start a nervous and exciting journey that almost imitates the

real operating mode.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i5-4590，AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i5-4590
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.ext_user_account_notice: You need to register a account with your email address.
